1.<if_woman>「おねーちゃん いた！<else>「おにーちゃん いた！<e: <if_woman>Here you are, sweetie!<else>Here you are, sweetie!<endif>

2.「この向こう 研究室ある！| 今から 扉 開けるプッケ！: Here's the research lab! Time to open the|door, oink!

3.「風の真珠…… 風の真珠！| アケレロ アケロレ プッケッケ！: Wind Pearl... Wind Pearl! Snorty Snorty Oinky!

5.<if_woman>「おねーちゃん 見ろプケ！| ここが 花 錬金してた研究室！: <if_woman>Look at this, oink! This is the research lab|where the flowers were smelted! We're here!|Oink!<else>Look at this, oink! This is the research lab|where the flowers were smelted! We're here!|Oink!<endif>

6.<if_woman>「おねーちゃんに あげる花 この奥！| ついてこいプッケ！！: <if_woman>Flowers for you! Follow me, Oink!!<else>Flowers for you! Follow me, Oink!!<endif>

9.「道案内 感謝するぞ……！ お前が| エテーネの錬金術師を 探しているのを知り|: Hey dudes, thanks for leading the way. I knew|you were searching for the Alchemist of|Ethene, so I followed you.

10.「テンスの花を作りだそうとする者の| 存在に気づき…… 追い続けて 数十年。|: The Tens Flowers were created here, so I|kept a close eye on you and voila! Must be a|bummer leading me here, compadres.

11.「よもや 清き水の洞くつでしか咲かぬ花を| このような場所で 咲かせるとは……|: Ya know, how could a flower that only blooms|in Clear Water Cave, bloom in this place? That|babe was no ordinary babe, dudemeisters.

12.「じゃが ヤツの努力も ここまで！| すべてのテンスの花を この世から消し去るこ: Such is a bummer, dudes. Time to fry these|flowers since like, that's the mission of us|totally demonic demons, after all.

13.「この地に咲いた テンスの花は| 魔導鬼ベゼブーが 焼き尽くしてくれるわ！: I, the great Sorcery Demon Bezebu will burn|these Tens Flowers to the ground!

15.<if_woman>「おねーちゃん…… お願い……。| だいじな…… 花…… 守: <if_woman>Please protect the flowers...<else>Please protect the flowers...<endif>

16.「テンスの花は 誰にも渡さん！| ……ジャマをするなら| お前も 焼き尽くしてく: No one gets Tens Flowers! If you get in my|way, I'll burn you to the ground too!

17.「すべてのテンスの花を この世から抹消する！| それが 我ら魔導鬼一族の使命じゃ: I will wipe out all Tens Flowers! That is the|mission of the Demon Tribe!

18.「テンスの花は 誰にも渡さん！| ……ジャマをするなら| お前も 焼き尽くしてく: No one gets Tens Flowers! If you get in my|way, I'll burn you to the ground too!

20.「も…申し訳……ございません……| 偉大なる 大魔王……マデサゴーラさまぁ……！: Forgive me, Great Demon King Madesagora...!

22.<if_woman>「ボク 平気。| 錬金術で すごく丈夫に 作ってもらった！|: <if_woman>Alchemy gave me bones of steel, oink! Come|here!<else>Alchemy gave me bones of steel, oink! Come|here!<endif>

24.<if_woman>「おねーちゃん！| この釜の中 見ろプッケ！！<else>「: <if_woman>Look in this pot, Oink!<else>Look in this pot, Oink!<endif>

25.<if_woman>「この花が おねーちゃんに 渡したかった花！| 輝くテンスの: <if_woman>Here's the flower I wanted to give you, oink!<else>Here's the flower I wanted to give you, oink!<endif>

26.「エテーネ村の 巫女さまに言われて作った| 聖なるチカラが いっぱいの花！| カ: The priestess of Ethene Village told me to|make this flower, and it is full of sacred|power! It will break the Galapagod's curse.

27.<if_woman>「おねーちゃんの<kyodai_rel3> この花 錬金する: <if_woman>Your <kyodai_rel3> traveled the world to find a|place where the Tens Flowers bloomed like in|the Old Spring to alchemize this flower.<else>Your <kyodai_rel3> traveled the world to find a|place where the Tens Flowers bloomed like in|the Old Spring to alchemize this flower.<endif>

28.<if_woman>「おねーちゃん！| 輝くテンスの花 おねーちゃんにやる！<e: <if_woman>I'll give you this shiny flower, oink!<else>I'll give you this shiny flower, oink!<endif>

30.「この錬金釜は ボクが| イッショウさんに返すように 言われてるプケ！: I'm supposed to return this alchemy pot to Mr.|Isshou, Oink!

31.<if_woman>「ボク 錬金釜 届けにいく！| おねーちゃん！ この手紙 読: <if_woman>I'm going to deliver this Alchemy Pot. After|you read this letter, come to Ethene Village|oink!<else>I'm going to deliver this Alchemy Pot. After|you read this letter, come to Ethene Village|oink!<endif>
